timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-10-15T11:02:36", "sender_email": "komal.s@amberstudent.com", "recipient_email": "dtay26000@gmail.com", "subject": "Re: Urgent: Need an update | amberstudent", "message": "Hi Dio Norman-Taylor,\\n\\nCould you please confirm if your booking is still active or if there have been any changes to your plans at Yugo Depot Point, London?\\n\\nIf you've already settled in, could you kindly let me know your room number and the email address you used when you booked your accommodation?\\n\\nYour prompt response would be highly appreciated.\\n\\nWarm regards,\\n\\n[AmberStudent]\\n\\nKomal S\\n\\nOperations Support Manager (Cancellations)\\n\\nPhone: [+447782397537]() | [Whatsapp Me]()\\n\\nEmail: [komal.s@amberstudent.com]()\\n\\nWebsite: [amberstudent.com]()\\n\\nOn Tue, Oct 14, 2025 at 8:17\u202fPM <[komal.s@amberstudent.com]()> wrote:\\n\\nHi Dio Norman-Taylor,\\n\\nI hope this message finds you in good health.\\n\\nThis is Komal from amberstudent, and I tried calling to reach out to discuss the details of your accommodation booking:\\n\\nProperty Name - Yugo Depot Point, London\\nRoom Type - Standard Ensuite\\nDuration of stay - 39 weeks\\nBooking date - 2025-08-26\\n\\nCould you please confirm if your booking is still active or if there have been any changes to your plans?\\n\\nIf you've already settled in, could you kindly let me know your room number and the email address you used when you booked your accommodation?\\n\\nYour prompt response would be highly appreciated.\\n\\nWarm regards,\\n\\n[AmberStudent]\\n\\nKomal S\\n\\nSales Support Executive (Cancellations)\\n\\nPhone: [+447782397537]() | [Whatsapp Me]()\\n\\nEmail: [komal.s@amberstudent.com]()\\n\\nWebsite: [amberstudent.com]()", "snippet": "Hi Dio Norman-Taylor, Could you please confirm if your booking is still active or if there have been any changes to your plans at Yugo Depot Point, London? transcripts.transcript_text: Speaker A: Welcome to the O2 messaging service. The person you are calling is unable.

Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Yeah, hello, Am I picking up? Do you hear, do you Normal?
Speaker A: Yes, why?
Speaker B: Yeah, actually beside Risha calling you from Amber. Student.
Speaker A: Calling about what?
Speaker B: Calling about your student accommodation for you. Both points.
Speaker A: Hang on, sorry, could you repeat that?
Speaker B: Yeah, the call is regarding your student accommodation for you. Go. Default point.
Speaker A: Oh yeah. Hi.
Speaker B: Hi. Hello. So actually in the morning I have tried to share you an email along with the credential for you and I can see that you are not available on WhatsApp at the moment. Correct.
Speaker A: Currently. Yeah. But I can change that.
Speaker B: Yeah. Can you please be active on the WhatsApp so that I can guide you what next step need is to be done. Along with that I have dropped you an email on the civil id. Like on your email id along with your current overness. Well, so I suppose that you have paid the 500 pounds as well for the advanced, right? Correct.
Speaker A: Yeah, yeah, we paid that.
Speaker B: And your email id. Can you please reconfirm your email id? Is it d t a y 26000 gmail.com is. Is it the email id?
Speaker A: That's it. Gmail.com that's it.
Speaker B: D dsy26000.
Speaker A: Sorry, dt dt a y. D a y or sy dt a y.
Speaker B: So actually you have mentioned sy. That's why it got confused. That's why I send it to the guarantor DT because.
Speaker A: Sorry, I'm so stupid.
Speaker B: Not. It's not an issue, it can be corrected later on. Until then, do one thing. Just be available on WhatsApp and then you can drop me a text on WhatsApp or I'll do one thing here. I'll be able to connect you on WhatsApp like after 5 to 10 minutes once you install and then I'll guide you step by step, like what need is to be done next. Okay.
Speaker A: Brilliant. Brilliant. That's so kind. Thanks very much for your help.
Speaker B: You're welcome. And also you have paid an additional fee of £51 in the morning, correct?
Speaker A: Yes.
Speaker B: So that is a refundable token. You don't have to pay twice. We have already initiated that refund and you will receive that 51 pounds within two or three days into your bank account. Okay.
Speaker A: Okay. That's. What's, what's the refund for?
Speaker B: The refund is for like the deposit was only 500. The 51 pound which you have paid was to holding the room. Since now your booking is confirmed, everything is completed, only the guarantor part remains. So we can refund that 51amount. Okay.
Speaker A: Okay, fantastic. Thanks very much for help.
Speaker B: You're welcome. Just be available on the water so that I can guide you step by step.
Speaker A: Okay, I'll do it now.
Speaker B: Okay, Bye.
Speaker A: Thanks. Bye.
Speaker A: Welcome to the O2 messaging service. The person you are calling is unable to take your call.
Speaker A: Welcome to the O2 messaging service. The person you are calling is unable to take your call. Please leave your message after the tone to re record your message.

Speaker A: Welcome to the O2 messaging service. The person you are calling is unable to take your call. Please leave your message after the tone. To re record your message key hash at any time.
Speaker B: Hi dear, this is Saeed Komal calling from Amber Student. We are trying to contact you just to understand the booking status of yours for the property that you booked with us, the Yugo Deport Point London. Please check your WhatsApp and email. We are waiting for your response. Bye bye.

Speaker A: Welcome to the O2 messaging service. The person you are calling is unable to take your call. Please leave your message after the tone. To re record your message key hash at any time.
Speaker B: Hey Deodor Sahib Komal calling Ma', am, the student. We are trying to contact you just to confirm the booking is still active or not for you.
Speaker A: Go.
Speaker B: Depot Point London Please check your email. We are waiting to respond, so by.
